scripts.enable: __process () { if [ -d "$1" ]; then printf '%s' "$1" > current-project ; else echo "$1" is invalid ; fi ; } ; __process
scripts.watch: cd `cat current-project` && npx gulp --gulpfile ../gulpfile.js --cwd=./ watch --sm && cd ..
scripts.clean: cd `cat current-project` && npx gulp --gulpfile ../gulpfile.js --cwd=./ clean && cd ..
scripts.devbuild: cd `cat current-project` && npx gulp --gulpfile ../gulpfile.js --cwd=./ dev --sm && cd ..
scripts.devwatch: cd `cat current-project` && npx gulp --gulpfile ../gulpfile.js --cwd=./ devWatch --sm && cd ..
scripts.devclean: cd `cat current-project` && npx gulp --gulpfile ../gulpfile.js --cwd=./ devClean && cd ..
scripts.stage: cd `cat current-project` && npx gulp --gulpfile ../gulpfile.js --cwd=./ zip --sm && cd ..
scripts.prod: cd `cat current-project` && npx gulp --gulpfile ../gulpfile.js --cwd=./ zip --min --sm && cd ..
scripts.tag: git tag -d ${npm_package_name}_${npm_package_version} 2>/dev/null ; git tag ${npm_package_name}_${npm_package_version} && git push -f origin ${npm_package_name}_${npm_package_version}
scripts.release: npm run tag && npm run prod
